languages.text: "Слава Трону! Прошу, следуйте за мной — я лично сопровожу вас к губернатору, под защиту стен и стражи!"
"Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and wardens!"
languages.original_text: "Слава Трону! Прошу, следуйте за мной — я лично сопровожу вас к губернатору, под защиту стен и стражи!"

traits.locale_text: "Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and guards!"
"Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and guards!"
"Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and guards!"
"Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and wardens!"

languages.text: «¡Alabado sea el Trono! Por favor, ¡sígame y le escoltaré hasta las estancias de la gobernadora, donde gozará de la protección de nuestros muros y guardias!».
languages.original_text: "Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and wardens!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alabado sea el Trono! Por favor, ¡sígame y le escoltaré hasta las estancias de la gobernadora, donde gozará de la protección de nuestros muros y guardias!».

languages.text: “赞美黄金王座！请随我来吧，我会亲自护送您前往总督那里。我们的城墙与卫兵会保护您的安全！”
languages.original_text: "Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and wardens!"

traits.locale_text: “赞美黄金王座！请随我来吧，我会亲自护送您前往总督那里。我们的城墙与卫兵会保护您的安全！”

languages.text: 「王座を称えよ！よろしければ、私が総督のところまで直々に護衛させていただきます。そちらには防護壁とワーデンがございますので！」
languages.original_text: "Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and wardens!"

traits.locale_text: 「王座を称えよ！よろしければ、私が総督のところまで直々に護衛させていただきます。そちらには防護壁とワーデンがございますので！」

languages.text: "Der Thron sei gepriesen! Wenn Ihr mir bitte folgen würdet. Ich geleite Euch persönlich zur Gouverneurin, bei der Euch Mauern und Wächter schützen werden!"
languages.original_text: "Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and wardens!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Thron sei gepriesen! Wenn Ihr mir bitte folgen würdet. Ich geleite Euch persönlich zur Gouverneurin, bei der Euch Mauern und Wächter schützen werden!"

languages.text: « Loué en soit le Trône ! Si vous voulez bien vous donner la peine de me suivre, je vous escorterai personnellement jusqu'à la gouverneure. À ses côtés, vous bénéficierez d'une protection renforcée ! »
languages.original_text: "Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and wardens!"

traits.locale_text: « Loué en soit le Trône ! Si vous voulez bien vous donner la peine de me suivre, je vous escorterai personnellement jusqu'à la gouverneure. À ses côtés, vous bénéficierez d'une protection renforcée ! »

languages.text: "Taht'a şükürler olsun! Beni takip etme lütfunda bulunursanız size valiye kadar bizzat eşlik edeceğim. Orada, duvarların ve dizdarların koruması altında olacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: "Praise the Throne! If you would please follow me, I will personally escort you to the governor, where you will have the protection of walls and wardens!"

traits.locale_text: "Taht'a şükürler olsun! Beni takip etme lütfunda bulunursanız size valiye kadar bizzat eşlik edeceğim. Valinin yanında, duvarların ve muhafızların koruması altında olacaksınız!"
